accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the agent system.

efficiency.description: The number of steps taken to arrive at the solution and the optimization of these steps.

robustness.description: The ability of the system to handle diverse inputs and provide consistent outputs.

traceability.description: The extent to which the reasoning process of the agents can be traced and understood.

execution_time.description: The time taken by the agent system to generate a solution.

resilience.description: The system's ability to avoid or handle errors during the execution process.

resource_usage.description: The amount of computational resources used to complete the task.

user_feedback.description: The clarity and usefulness of the feedback provided to the user during the process.
